posts.summary:
I’m back! I know it has been a while since I posted.  After 

bariatric 

 surgery it took me a while to get focus to really be...
posts.caption:
I’m back!

I know it has been a while since I posted.  After bariatric surgery it took me a while to get focus to really be able to create something.   I am sure you all know how that can be.  Big moments that throw other things out of alignment.  With the new year I have set some major goals for things that I want to achieve. 

1: Sundays, Mondays and Tuesdays are going to be devoted to Gif making.  hopefully this will mean at least 1 new entry each week. 

2: Its time to work on a more marketable skillset, so Thursday, Friday and Saturday are devoted to learning Javascript, HTML and CSS.  

and 

3: I really want to learn to make music, though this is a lower priority, so I am giving Wednesdays to that pursuit. maybe one day I will be making music to play behind my gif’s Who knows.  

I want your feedback on this gif and anything else you wanna talk about?

posts.summary: How did the surgery went?
posts.question: How did the surgery went?
posts.answer: I have lost 150 pounds since July 5th.  I did have some complications and spent a month in hospital, but everything is much better now.  one day soon I will post some selfies of my progress over on Adamheathimage.tumblr.com but today is not that day.

reblog.comment: I have lost 150 pounds since July 5th.  I did have some complications and spent a month in hospital, but everything is much better now.  one day soon I will post some selfies of my progress over on Adamheathimage.tumblr.com but today is not that day.

posts.summary: Life changer!
posts.title: Life changer!
posts.body: Hey Tumblr friends, I just wanted to let you know, I won’t be posting for a month or two, July 5th, i will be undergoing bariatric surgery for weight loss. The recovery time is 4 to 6 weeks, during which time I will be focusing on healing. I have two designs I will post before the surgery so keep an eye out for those. Much love, the Obviologist!

reblog.comment: Hey Tumblr friends, I just wanted to let you know, I won’t be posting for a month or two, July 5th, i will be undergoing bariatric surgery for weight loss. The recovery time is 4 to 6 weeks, during which time I will be focusing on healing. I have two designs I will post before the surgery so keep an eye out for those. Much love, the Obviologist!

The recovery time is 4 to 6 weeks, during which time I will be focusing on healing. I have two designs I will post before the surgery so keep an eye out for those. Much love, the Obviologist!

The recovery time is 4 to 6 weeks, during which time I will be focusing on healing. I have two designs I will post before the surgery so keep an eye out for those. Much love, the Obviologist!
